alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 09 at 9:12AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...For the Beaver River in east central Lewis County in central New York. * WHEN...Until 915 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Beaver River and its tributaries and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring in the warned area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 909 AM EDT,gauge reports indicate the Beaver River is nearing 6 feet. Continued runoff from recent heavy rains into the river are expected to bring the river`s crest to near or above 6 feet. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Croghan, Kirschnerville, Belfort, Soft Maple Reservoir and Beaver Falls. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
